# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "Projucer.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("Projucer")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED Projucer_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Projucer_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(Projucer_jucer_FILE
  "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.0.0"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "M70qfTRRk"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "Projucer"
  PROJECT_VERSION "5.0.0"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  SPLASH_SCREEN_COLOUR "Dark"
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.juce.theprojucer"
  INCLUDE_BINARYDATA ON

)

jucer_appconfig_header(
  USER_CODE_SECTION
"
/*
 ==============================================================================
 In accordance with the terms of the JUCE 5 End-Use License Agreement, the
 JUCE Code in SECTION A cannot be removed, changed or otherwise rendered
 ineffective unless you have a JUCE Indie or Pro license, or are using JUCE
 under the GPL v3 license.

 End User License Agreement: www.juce.com/juce-5-licence

 If you are using a GPL v3 license then you can set JUCER_ENABLE_GPL_MODE to
 1 to use the Projucer without online license validation.
 ==============================================================================
 */

// BEGIN SECTION A

#define JUCER_ENABLE_GPL_MODE 0

// BEGIN SECTION A
"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/MacOSX" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "-Wall"
    "-Wshadow"
    "-Wno-missing-field-initializers"
    "-Wshadow"
    "-Wshorten-64-to-32"
    "-Wstrict-aliasing"
    "-Wuninitialized"
    "-Wunused-parameter"
    "-Wconversion"
    "-Wsign-compare"
    "-Wint-conversion"
    "-Woverloaded-virtual"
    "-Wreorder"
    "-Wconstant-conversion"
    "-Wsign-conversion"
    "-Wextra-semi"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_SMALL "<None>"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  DOCUMENT_FILE_EXTENSIONS
    ".jucer"
  CUSTOM_PLIST "<plist>
<dict>
	<key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key>
	<dict>
		<key>NSAllowsArbitraryLoads</key>
		<true/>
		<key>NSExceptionDomains</key>
		<dict>
			<key>amazonaws.com</key>
			<dict>
				<key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
				<true/>
				<key>NSIncludesSubdomains</key>
				<true/>
			</dict>
		</dict>
	</dict>
</dict>
</plist>"
  EXTRA_FRAMEWORKS
    "AudioUnit"
    "Accelerate"
    "AVFoundation"
    "CoreAudio"
    "CoreAudioKit"
    "CoreMIDI"
    "DiscRecording"
    "QuartzCore"
    "AudioToolbox"
    "OpenGL"
    "QTKit"
    "QuickTime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "-O0 (no optimisation)"
  OSX_BASE_SDK_VERSION "Use Default"
  OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET "10.9"
  OSX_ARCHITECTURE "Use Default"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "-O3 (fastest with safe optimisations)"
  OSX_BASE_SDK_VERSION "Use Default"
  OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET "10.7"
  OSX_ARCHITECTURE "Use Default"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/VisualStudio2013" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  # EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  # PLATFORM_TOOLSET "v120"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  WHOLE_PROGRAM_OPTIMISATION "Always disable"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/VisualStudio2015" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  # PLATFORM_TOOLSET "v140"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/LinuxMakefile" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "-std=c++11"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_SMALL "<None>"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "-O0 (no optimisation)"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  OPTIMISATION "-O3 (fastest with safe optimisations)"
)

jucer_project_end()
